SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package com.floweektracker.controller

Class TaskAddingDialogController

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.controller.TaskAddingDialogController
public class TaskAddingDialogController extends Object
Controller of the TaskAddingDialog class. This class handles the user interactions and business logic related to adding new task, by communicating with TasksService, PlannerService, and WeekdayPlannerService.

Fields: taskAddingDialog, tasksService, plannerService, weekdayPlannerService

Listeners methods: initializeListeners(), createSingleTask()

Add task methods: addTask(SingleTask), isTaskAdded(SingleTask), rollback(SingleTask, List)

Other methods: updateTaskNames(String)

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskAddingDialogController

      public TaskAddingDialogController(TaskAddingDialog taskAddingDialog)
      Creates a controller for the given TaskAddingDialog and sets up listeners for its buttons. Checks if the given TaskAddingDialog is null and throws an IllegalArgumentException if it is.
      Parameters:
      taskAddingDialog - a reference to the TaskAddingDialog instance to be managed by this controller
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given TaskAddingDialog is null
      See Also:
      • initializeListeners()
      • MainFrame

  • Method Details

    • initializeListeners

      public void initializeListeners()
      Adds listeners to the buttons from the taskAddingDialog. The first button is for adding a task. The second one is for closing the dialog.
      See Also:
      • TaskAddingDialogController(com.floweektracker.view.TaskAddingDialog)
      • addTask(SingleTask)
      • createSingleTask()

    • addTask

      boolean addTask(SingleTask task)
      Adds a given task to the TasksService, PlannerView and WeekdayPlannerView. If any of these operations fails, the task is rolled back. It also checks if the given task is null and returns false if it is. It also makes taskAddingDialog invisible.
      Parameters:
      task - a given task which should be added to the planner
      Returns:
      true if task is successfully added, otherwise false
      See Also:
      • isTaskAdded(SingleTask)
      • rollback(SingleTask, List)
      • initializeListeners()

    • updateTaskNames

      public boolean updateTaskNames(String taskName)
      Updates the tasks combo box in the taskAddingDialog. It checks if the given task name is in the tasks combo box. If it is, it removes it. Otherwise, it inserts it in the correct position. If the task name is null or black, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      taskName - a given task name which should be updated (removed or inserted)
      Returns:
      true when the task name is successfully updated, otherwise false
      See Also:
      • TaskNamesController.updateTaskNamesView()
